actions.name: Cup-as-a-Service
actions.description: Use reusable cups instead of single-use disposable cups at airport cafes and restaurants
actions.impact_description: Prevents 15g of plastic/paper cup waste per use

source.name: Changi Airport Waste Audit 2023
source.citation: Changi Airport Group. (2023). Waste Audit and Circularity Program. Changi Airport Group Sustainability Department.

actions.name: Refuse Bag, Bring Own Bag
actions.description: Decline single-use shopping bags and use your own reusable bag
actions.impact_description: Prevents 8g of plastic bag waste per transaction

source.name: Changi Airport Waste Audit 2023
source.citation: Changi Airport Group. (2023). Waste Audit and Circularity Program. Changi Airport Group Sustainability Department.

actions.name: Plant-Based Meal
actions.description: Choose a plant-based meal option at airport restaurants
actions.impact_description: Reduces carbon footprint by approximately 2.5kg CO2e compared to meat-based meal

source.name: DEFRA 2023, Poore & Nemecek 2018
source.citation: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs (DEFRA). (2023). Greenhouse gas reporting: conversion factors 2023. UK Government. Poore, J., & Nemecek, T. (2018). Reducing food's environmental impacts through producers and consumers. Science, 360(6392), 987-992.

actions.name: Use Water Refill Station
actions.description: Refill your reusable water bottle at airport water refill stations instead of buying bottled water
actions.impact_description: Prevents 20g of plastic bottle waste per refill

source.name: Changi Airport Waste Audit 2023
source.citation: Changi Airport Group. (2023). Waste Audit and Circularity Program. Changi Airport Group Sustainability Department.
